column5: Anyone know what part of town the fire was in Lindsay last night?  Two firefighter's were injured.  A resident was hospitalized.
I saw that fire on the Toronto news last night Jeff, hopefully none of the injuries were too serious.  Fighting fires in these cold temps makes the job even tougher than usual.
its was by the post office and that optical place.  i think its russel, i live there and i dont even know the names of the streets, lol.
Here's the article from the Star.  Says it was a house being converted to apartments.  http://www.thestar.com/News/Ontario/article/572205
